Advise patients on lifestyle changes and preventive health measures.

Review patient medication regimens for safety, efficacy, and drug interactions.

Work with healthcare providers to adjust medication therapies as needed.

Clinical Support:

Order, stock, and manage medications and supplies to ensure they are available for patient needs.

Monitor medication expiration dates and ensure proper disposal of expired or unused drugs.

Regulatory Compliance:

Keep up-to-date with the latest pharmaceutical laws, regulations, and safety guidelines.

Health Screenings and Immunizations:

Administer certain vaccines and perform health screenings (e.g., blood pressure, cholesterol levels).

Provide guidance on the management of chronic conditions, such as diabetes.

Customer Service:

Maintain accurate patient records in compliance with health privacy regulations.

Document patient interactions and medication consultations.
